career_quiz_description: Career questionnaires can help you identify your interests and how they relate to the world of work. You can find out what you like to do. This career quiz helps you decide what kind of career you might want to pursue. The Career Questionnaire contains 60 questions about work activities that some people do on their job. Read each question carefully. Decide how you feel about each type of work:
career_quiz_tip: Try not to think about whether you have enough education or training to do the job. Or how much money you want to work. Just think about whether you like or dislike working. This is not a test! There is no right or wrong answer! Please take your time to answer the questions. No need to hurry! You are learning about your interests so you can find a job you might like and find a reward!
careers_that_match_your_area_of_interest: Careers that match your area of ​​interest.
